content: what is  \"Caution: Contents May Be Hot\" t-shirt (cf existing ones)?

The phrase "Caution: Contents May Be Hot" is often used humorously or as a warning on various t-shirts and merchandise. It is typically referencing the warnings found on hot beverage cups or food packaging to caution people about the temperature of the contents. The t-shirt version is a playful way of expressing this warning or making a statement about hot beverages.
